resources.string: The capital of the United States has a number of attractions to see by day, great food to sample and indulge in, and nightlife to enjoy. This guide will show you some of the highlights!
Casual pub with drag events, sports games, and poker night.
Iconic late night eatery and bar.
Established in 1846 \"for the increase and diffusion of knowledge,\" is a group of museums and research centers administered by the Government of the United States.
The National Museum of Natural History is a natural history museum administered by the Smithsonian Institution, located on the National Mall in Washington, D.C., United States.
Holds the largest collection of historic aircraft and spacecraft in the world.
"Official memorial to the Holocaust. Adjacent to the National Mall in Washington, D.C., the USHMM provides for the documentation, study, and interpretation of Holocaust history. "
The National Gallery of Art, and its attached Sculpture Garden, is a national art museum in Washington, D.C.

The National Museum of American History: Kenneth E. Behring Center collects, preserves and displays the heritage of the United States in the areas of social, political, cultural, scientific and military history.

The International Spy Museum is a privately owned museum dedicated to the tradecraft, history and contemporary role of espionage, featuring the largest collection of international espionage artifacts currently on public display.
The Newseum is an interactive museum of news and journalism located at 555 Pennsylvania Ave. NW, Washington, D.C. The seven-level, 250,000-square-foot museum features 15 theaters and 15 galleries
Landmark obelisk rising from the National Mall that honors America\'s first president.
Columned rotunda in the style of Rome\'s Pantheon on the man-made reservoir known as the Tidal Basin.
Parthenon-inspired tribute to Abraham Lincoln with a 19-ft. marble statue, murals & reflecting pool.
Iconic outdoor memorial honoring the 16 million Americans who served during World War II.
Memorial to FDR featuring waterfalls, sculptures & quotes from the former president.
Memorial to Robert Taft with obelisks , statues, and waterfall.
Robert A. Taft Memorial and Carillon
